title.rendered: The Real Bling Ring: Hollywood Heist

content.rendered:
Directed by Miles Blayden-Ryall

Cast Cabot Rea( Self – Voiceover3 episodes, 2022 ). Tim Cullingworth-Hudson( Young Sean Erenstoft2 episodes, 2022 ). Audrina Patridge(1 episode, 2022 ). Perez Hilton(1 episode, 2022 ). Alexis Haines( Neiers1 episode, 2022 ). Nick Norgo( Prugo1 episode, 2022 ). Andrea Arlington-Dunne(1 episode, 2022 ). Gabrielle Hames(1 episode, 2022 ). Eden Maimon( Self1 episode, 2022 )

Language English

Producers Robert Davis. Lawrence Walford. Diana Aroutiounova. Miles Blayden-Ryall. Roselyne Bomford. Alastair Cook. Lucy De-Vaux Balbirnie. Liz Elkington. John Greathead. Jonah Weston

Production Channel 4 Television. Double Act Productions.

Official site Netflix

Season 1

Episodes 3
